solution_line_template: Lucy can read {lucy_more_than_oliver} more pages than Oliver who can read {oliver_pages} pages so Lucy can read {oliver_pages}+{lucy_more_than_oliver} = <<{lucy_more_than_oliver}+{oliver_pages}={lucy_pages}>>{lucy_pages} pages
Carter can read half as many pages as Lucy who can read {lucy_pages} pages so he can read {lucy_pages}/{half_divisor} = <<{carter_pages}={carter_pages}>>{carter_pages} pages in 1 hour
